item.description:
Project Smile, the non profit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic events will be selling raffle tickets on Boston Event Guide's upcoming Boston Harbor Cruise. We are looking for a few volunteers who would like to come and help us sell tickets to guests on the cruise. You get free entry onto the cruise ($25 value) and you will be helping a great cause!

We are looking for outgoing volunteers who enjoy meeting new people and enjoy selling raffle tix for charity. Once you sign up it is a commitment to help, so please only sign up if you are definitely able to volunteer.

We will meet outside the 7-11 store on Seaport Blvd. next to the Pier and World Trade Center at 7:30. Cruise departs promptly at 8pm, we will be on board the Provincetown II, operated by Bay State Cruise Company. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

For more info on Project Smile, please visit www.projectsmile.org
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) outside 7-11 store. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Volunteer Oppty. Help Sell Charity Raffle Tix on Boston Harbor Cruise
